players.name: Alice
memory: You: "I find it strange that Charlie was the one who was found dead last night. Let's keep a close eye on each other and make sure we vote wisely."

Bob: "I believe it's important that we all work together to uncover the truth behind Charlie's death. Let's try to gather as much information as possible during the day and use it wisely when we vote at night."

You: "I think we should all consider the possibility that one of us is the mafioso and may be trying to manipulate our votes. Let's try to stay focused on collecting evidence during the day and use it to make informed decisions at night."
Diana: "I will continue to play cautiously and gather information. I know Charlie is dead, but I'm not sure who did it yet. Let's see what happens today."
